summary: Rodeo star John Scott and his gambler friend Kansas Charlie are wrongly accused of armed robbery. They leave town as fast as they can to go looking for their own suspects in Poker City.
cast: John Wayne|Mary Kornman|Paul Fix|Eddy Chandler|Carmen Laroux|Lafe McKee|Al Ferguson|Henry Hall|Silver Tip Baker|Frank Ball|Frank Brownlee|Tommy Coats|Dick Dickinson|Bert Dillard|Frank Ellis|Jack Evans|Olin Francis|Herman Hack|Jack Hendricks|Theodore Lorch|Lew Meehan|Artie Ortego|Tex Palmer|Fred Parker|Archie Ricks|Wally West
director: Director: Lewis D. Collins (as Cullen Lewis)
title: El camino del desierto
